SELECT vehicle_uid, ifnull(device_no,'') as device_no, ifnull(vehicle_no, '') as vehicle_no, ifnull(come_in_date, '') as come_in_date, ifnull(go_out_date,'') as go_out_date, is_out, ifnull(had_over_speed,0) as had_over_speed, ifnull(had_on_restrict_area,0) as had_on_restrict_area, ifnull(last_x,0) as last_x, ifnull(last_y,0) as last_y, ifnull(last_latitude,0) as last_latitude, ifnull(last_longitude,0) as last_longitude, ifnull(last_speed,0) as last_speed, ifnull(last_is_over_speed,0) as last_is_over_speed, ifnull(last_on_restrict_area,0) as last_on_restrict_area,
ifnull(vehicle_type,'') as vehicle_type FROM tbvc_vehicle WHERE
is_out = 0 and ifnull(last_speed,0) > 10
come_in_date >= #{from} and come_in_date <= #{to} and vehicle_no like CONCAT('%', #{vehicle_no}, '%')
and had_over_speed >= 1
and had_on_restrict_area >= 1
ORDER BY come_in_date, vehicle_uid DESC

SELECT violation_uid , vehicle_uid, ifnull(begin_section_uid, '') as begin_section_uid, ifnull(end_section_uid, '') as end_section_uid, ifnull(come_in_date, '') as come_in_date, ifnull(go_out_date,'') as go_out_date, violation_type, ifnull(in_speed,0) as in_speed, ifnull(avg_speed,0) as avg_speed, ifnull(peak_speed,0) as peak_speed FROM tbvc_violation_history WHERE vehicle_uid = #{vehicleUid} ORDER BY come_in_date, vehicle_uid DESC limit 1000

SELECT event_uid , vehicle_uid, section_uid, ifnull(vehicle_no, '') as vehicle_no, ifnull(device_no, '') as device_no, ifnull(speed,0) as speed, ifnull(latitude,0) as latitude, ifnull(longitude,0) as longitude, ifnull(x,0) as x, ifnull(y,0) as y, ifnull(is_over_speed,0) as is_over_speed, ifnull(is_on_road,1) as is_on_road, ifnull(is_on_restrict_area,0) as is_on_restrict_area, ifnull(reg_date, '') as reg_date FROM tbvc_driving_event WHERE vehicle_uid = #{vehicleUid} ORDER BY event_uid ASC

SELECT b.no, event_uid, a.vehicle_uid, section_uid, IFNULL(a.vehicle_no, '') AS vehicle_no, IFNULL(a.device_no, '') AS device_no, IFNULL(a.speed, 0) AS speed, IFNULL(a.is_over_speed, 0) AS is_over_speed, IFNULL(a.is_on_road, 1) AS is_on_road, IFNULL(a.is_on_restrict_area, 0) AS is_on_restrict_area, IFNULL(a.reg_date, '') AS reg_date, IFNULL(b.come_in_date, '') AS come_in_date FROM tbvc_driving_event a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT no, vehicle_uid, device_no, come_in_date FROM (SELECT @i:=@i + 1 AS no, come_in_date, vehicle_uid, IFNULL(device_no, '') AS device_no, IFNULL(vehicle_no, '') AS vehicle_no FROM tbvc_vehicle, (SELECT @i:=0 ) t WHERE come_in_date >= #{from} and come_in_date <= #{to} and vehicle_no like CONCAT('%', #{vehicle_no}, '%')
and had_over_speed >= 1
and had_on_restrict_area >= 1
ORDER BY come_in_date DESC , vehicle_uid ASC) t ORDER BY no DESC ) b ON (a.vehicle_uid = b.vehicle_uid and a.device_no = b.device_no) WHERE b.come_in_date >= #{from} and b.come_in_date <= #{to} and a.vehicle_no like CONCAT('%', #{vehicle_no}, '%')
and is_over_speed = 1
and is_on_restrict_area = 1
ORDER BY b.come_in_date ASC
